markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Icicle Snake](/Monsters.aspx?ID=663)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Translucent and capable of hanging suspended and near motionless, icicle snakes sense the heat of living creatures as a threat and attempt to use their camouflage and chilling bite against foes.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/ElementalWater_IcicleSnake.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Icicle Snake](/Monsters.aspx?ID=663)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 35

**Immunities**
bleed, cold, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Weaknesses**
fire 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +9 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing plus 1d6 [persistent cold](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Icicle** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) Until the next time it acts, the icicle snake appears to be an unassuming icicle. It has an automatic result of 27 on [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks and DCs to pass as an icicle.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-45" />
name: Icicle Snake
